6.67: Increased  Storm Hammer cooldown from 14 to 15.
6.42: Increased  Toughness Aura armor bonus from 1/2/4/5 to 2/3/5/6.
6.43: Reduced  Toughness Aura armor bonus from 2/3/5/6 to 2/3/4/5.
6.50: Reduced base armor from 1 to -1 (total armor is now 1.24).  God's Strength is no longer dispelled by cyclones.
6.35: Increased base armor from 0 to 1 (total armor is now 3.24).
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.79: Storm Hammer: Reduced cooldown from 15 to 13. Is now disjointable. When disjointed, none of its effects will apply, including the area effect.
6.72c: Increased  Warcry radius from 450 to 700. Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Great Cleave Increased radius from 200 to 300. Rescaled damage from 30%/40%/50%/60% to 25%/40%/55%/70%.  Warcry Increased radius from 700 to 900. Increased armor bonus from 3/6/9/12 to 4/8/12/16. Increased  God's Strength attack damage bonus from 100%/140%/180% to 100%/150%/200%.
6.77: Reduced  Great Cleave damage from 25%/40%/55%/70% to 20%/35%/50%/65%. Reduced  Warcry duration from 8 to 7.
6.10: Reduced movement speed from 300 to 295. Reduced  Great Cleave damage from 15%/30%/45%/60% to 12%/25%/37%/50%
6.17: God's Strength Reduced duration from 40 to 30. Rescaled damage bonus from 75%/125%/175% to 100%/125%/150%. Reduced cooldown from 120/90/80 to 100/90/80. Reduced manacost from 150/200/250 to 100/150/200.
6.73: Increased  Great Cleave damage from 20%/30%/40%/50% to 30%/40%/50%/60%.  Warcry Increased duration from 6 to 8. Removed cast time (was 0.3).  God's Strength Is no longer purgeable. Increased attack damage bonus from 100%/125%/150% to 100%/140%/180%.
6.72: Increased attack range from 125 to 128. Increased  Great Cleave radius from 175 to 200.
6.58: Reduced  God's Strength's cooldown from 120 to 80 seconds.
6.80: Increased base armor from -1 to 2 (total armor is now 4.94). Reduced  Warcry cooldown from 36/30/24/18 to 32/26/20/14.
6.81: Increased base damage from 31-33 to 37-39 (total attack damage is now 60-62).
6.82: Added  Aghanim's Scepter: While active,  God's Strength grants a 900 radius allied aura, granting allied heroes 40%/60%/80% attack damage bonus.
6.83: Increased  Warcry duration from 7 to 8. Increased  Aghanim's Scepter's upgraded  God's Strength ally attack damage bonus from 40%/60%/80% to 50%/75%/100%.
6.84: Increased  Warcry armor bonus from 4/8/12/16 to 5/10/15/20.
6.14: Reduced  Great Cleave damage from 12%/25%/37%/50% to 10%/20%/30%/40%.
6.20: Reduced  Storm Bolt damage from 125/175/250/300 to 100/150/200/250. Increased  God's Strength cooldown from 100/90/80 to 120/120/120.
